bug.author: StudentUsingGithup
bug.description:
when i write in jupyter <denchmark-code>import tensorflow as tf matrix_det = tf.matrix_determinant(matrix_3) </denchmark-code>
the error will be:``` AttributeError Traceback (most recent call last) in ----> 1 matrix_det = tf.matrix_determinant(matrix_3) AttributeError: module 'tensorflow' has no attribute 'matrix_determinant' <denchmark-code></denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I am able to replicate this issue, please find the <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/gist/Saduf2019/4a15a2dad484fc852a66e8165d95b945/untitled441.ipynb>gist here</denchmark-link> .
is deprecated and revived as . You may try using <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/linalg/det>tf.linalg.det</denchmark-link> function in TF 2.X
